item.title: I summarised a 3 hour long youtube video using Langchain + Claude
item.description: I used Langchain + Claude to summarise Sam Altman’s testimony to the US Senate on AI.

item.title: From Rules to Vectors: How NLP Changed Over Time
item.description: This is a quick summary of Manning’s [article](https://www.amacad.org/sites/default/files/publication/downloads/Daedalus Sp22 09 Manning.pdf) on the history and future of natural language processing and foundation models.
